features: Ergonomic Design - The office chair is designed to enhance the sitting position of office workers and help them to avoid neck, upper, and lower back stiffness, pain, and discomfort. The back and seat upholstered provide support, a large thick pad, and a soft texture slow down the pressure of the sedentary.

Multi Function - This desk chair features a gas lift mechanism. You can adjust its height smoothly by pushing the lever located under the seat. This executive chair can be adjusted for height and tilt, so you can get the most comfortable office entertainment and rest use according to your needs.

Solid Construction - Built with premium materials and meticulous craftsmanship, this faux leather computer chair is robust and long-lasting. 360° Swivel, heavy-duty base, and smooth-rolling castors make a super stable structure.

Ultra-Comfortable - The Ergonomic office chair with the soft padded seat cushion will allow you to sit in comfort at your desk while working, studying, or giving in to your gamer passion. Maximize your performance at home or in the workplace with a large and wide, comfy.

Space-saving & Easy to Assemble - The leather executive chair with flip-up arms, which will be easily customized to your specific needs. The office chair with detailed instructions and tools included in the package, you can easily assemble the chair on your own.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Our executive office chair has a padded headrest and lumbar support that's perfect for working, studying, gaming, and completing WFH projects.
With its ergonomic design, durability, and elegant aesthetics, it is sure to enhance any office environment and provide a comfortable and productive workspace.
The padded seat cushion offers more comfort, ensuring long hours of sitting without discomfort or fatigue.
Designed with ergonomics in mind, the office chair features a contoured backrest that provides excellent lumbar support, promoting good posture and reducing the risk of back pain.

The sturdy frame and base are constructed from high-quality materials, ensuring long-lasting performance. The smooth-rolling casters allow for effortless mobility, making it easy to move around the office or workspace.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Arrived on time
reviews.reviewText: This item arrived on time box seems to be in good shape can’t wait to have it out together to use next week for work!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfy and smooth rolling
reviews.reviewText: Definitely an upgrade from my gamer chair that I used at my desk for work. The wheels on this chair are a lot smoother and glide nicely across the floor. Easy to move up and down as needed. The material is soft and plush enough to be super comfy and enjoyable to sit in while getting work and homework done. Highly recommend 👍🏾

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great desk chair for the price!
reviews.reviewText: This is a great chair for the price. Easy to assemble too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Basic and Functional
reviews.reviewText: The chair was packed very well and easy to put together. The wrench you need for the bolts was included. A nice set of directons was provided.The chair is solid and the material is soft and comfortable feeling. You can adjust the height, how much tilt, or have no tilt. It roosl really easily on my rug and wood floors. So for a basic chair it hits all the right marks.However, I do not find the chair to fit me well and it is a bit uncomfortable. If using for a short time it is no problem. However, for long use I didn't enjoy it. I do think chairs are a personal fit so when buying one online you risk having one that just doesn't suit your body well. This chair is not deep enough for me and I do not find any lumbar support. Again, this is a personal thing.The ad states that the arms flip up but they do not!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Update. No answer from seller or Amazon. Seller impossible to contact. and Amazon says nothing. I will have to buy another cylinder for this chair that is barely 2 months old. Keep sinking down. DON'T BUY THIS CHAIR......................

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Value for the Money
reviews.reviewText: This chair is very well machined and therefore easy to assemble. My only advice is to leave all 8 screws loosely threaded when attaching the arm rests, then tighten once finished before inserting the screw covers. That makes inserting the back of the chair a breeze. It is also important to note that the arm rest are fixed and do not flip up to slide under a low clearance desk. I actually prefer that the arm rests are not movable as it makes for a sturdier chair.I am 6'3" and the chair fits me perfectly. I also keep it adjusted as low as it goes. My wife is a foot shorter than I and her feet don't touch the floor at that setting. Smaller women will probably need a foot stool.The cushions are very soft and comfortable, and the faux black leather feels supple and should be easy to keep clean. The five legs of the chair have enough diameter that when I roll from one desk to another there is no risk of tipping over. All in all, I highly recommend this office chair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good solid chair, nice high back, lots of cushion, not for larger individuals
reviews.reviewText: Good average office chair. Assemply was easy and after it was assembled, it was solid. Parts fit well together and it was not loose at the joints. Lots of padding on the chair makes it almost pillowy. This chair was definitely made for the average sized person though. If you are of the larger variety, or of the shorter variety, you might it a little wanting.For the shorter people, this chair sits very high. Im a taller person and normally I have to extend the chair to its highest extension before I can sit comfortably in it. With this chair, I was sitting comfortably at almost the lowest spot. I asked a friend of mine, who is 5'7" to sit in it, and her legs were dangling off the ground.The chair shows a weight limit of 275lbs, and I would not push it much past that, not that it would be comfortable anyways. The chair is narrow, side to side, and for a larger persion the armrest bars dig into the sides of my thighs and makes it uncomfortable. Also, the seat is not very deep. I always get that "Im sliding out" feeling.But if you are of average size and build, this would be a good, comfortable, and probably long lasting chair to have.
